website_summaries.verdict: An affordable cat treat that helps improve bad breath as well as litter box smells.
pros: Features spirulina, parsley, yucca extract, and Champignon mushrooms to improve odors coming from the intestines
Helps improve bad breath and litter box smells
Treats can be given daily alone or broken up into food
cons: Treats are large and hard for some cats to chew

customer_reviews.title: Flat out works
customer_reviews.text: My cat has IBD and a host of other issues. Her poop is pretty rank (she’s under a doctor’s care). Like, when I walk in the door I can tell if she has used the litterbox rank. She really likes snacks, so whenever I find something in a flavored chewable, I try it. While she doesn’t like these as much as her other snack/vitamins, she will eat them. They seriously work (or I have lost my sense of smell due to the onslaught of IBD poop). I wish I could knock off half a star b/c she doesn’t gobble them, but I think rounding down would be really harsh considering how well they work.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamonster

customer_reviews.title: Smells weird, cat stopped eating them, and didn’t make much of a difference
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I paid almost $8 for these. They have a strong smell which isn’t very pleasant, and they don’t have a true flavor. My cat was very confused by them. She would eat them for a couple weeks, but she would always spit them out 2-3x before eating it. After those couple weeks, I think she decided they were gross and now she won’t eat them anymore. They didn’t seem to make much of a difference with her urine or fecal odor either. I would not recommend these. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maya B.

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats, one female and one male, the male has always smelled so bad when he pooped!!! The vet recommended some stuff, so I got on Amazon to see what was available and tried this product. The female won't have anything to do with them, but the male LOVES it! He eats them up and it has seemed to not only help with the smell but also help with some stomach issues he was having that we weren't aware of. Will definitely continue to buy these for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bright

customer_reviews.title: My pet mouse likes it and makes his cage less stinky
customer_reviews.text: I give it to my sweet pet mouse that I've had since he was a tiny baby, 6 days old, good for him and makes his cage smell better. Here he is getting cashew nuts after using his bell pull ("bloody servants!") followed by what he knows as "green stuff". He likes this product but LOVES his cashews.
customer_reviews.author: Aries Laser Designs

customer_reviews.title: Kitten eats them..
customer_reviews.text: My rescue kitten had horrible litter box odor probably due to a poor diet prior to my obtaining her. She'll eat these but I haven't noticed any difference in the odor of her stools. They're soft enough for a kitten but the size is a bit large for a kitten but they easily break in half or thirds.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen thater

customer_reviews.title: Really does work
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and really do work. My cat's poops are super smelly. They've been cleared by a vet and eat a good food but it's just awful. I tried these out and noticed a difference in two to three days. And when I ran out after a few days the poops we're back to smelly. I know have it autoshipped so I don't run out again
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes them, but . . .
customer_reviews.text: Only so-so for odor control. But Kittypoo does have some serious digestive issues, so I'm not really surprised. Kind of expensive, too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have a big 18 pound male cat and the whole household knows when he uses the litter box. After researching online for something to help with the odor I found this product and decided to give it a try. He loves the taste and just two treats a day is all he needs. (If you have a small to medium sized cat, you might be able to just give it one treat per day.) The litter box odor is significantly reduced. Pet Naturals products are very high quality and we highly recommend the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I would have never believed it but these things actually work. Our cat could clear out the house when he used the box but after two days of eating 2 of these a day, the smell is all but gone (it still smells, but the smell is not unplesent). In addition, it actually makes his breath better. We will be buying these as long as he is alive!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Williams

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I really hate saying this since I love Pet Naturals of Vermont’s probiotic treats for dogs, but these “Clean Scat” treats are horrible!! First of all they didn’t help my cats at all, this only applies to my 2 cats who would eat these treats because my other 2 cats refused to eat these, with their gas and horrible smelling feces problems (these treats actually made their gas problems and smelly poop worse)!!! And second of all they smell horrible which made 2 of my cats stick their nose up at these treats and refuse to eat them!! I definitely don’t recommend these treats to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: mysoncaden

customer_reviews.title: Work like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: These really work, and my cat absolutely loves them (she goes bonkers for anything with chicken liver). Her litter box is in a closet about 6 feet away from my computer desk (AKA where I spent a ton of time) and the combination of these treats + an automatic litter box means that there is seriously no odor at all. It's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Hard for cat to eat
customer_reviews.text: Before I found this product, my cat could clear the room when he poops or pass gas. I found out about this product and immediately rushed to buy it. When I gave him the treat with his food, he didn't like the taste and would spit it back out. It would take him about 10 minutes to finally eat the treat. It does work, don't get me wrong, but I guess it doesn't taste that good to him.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These work fantastic! My cat has been on them for 4 days now and we barely notice any smell at all from her litter box. Before it was so strong it would make you sick to your stomach. The treats themselves smell exactly like beef bouillon cubes. She's a really picky eater so I didn't know if I'd have to mix it with wet food or not but she gobbles them right up. I will definitely keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Latta

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! My picky cat loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Our cat will only eat seafood flavored food and it makes him stink! I was afraid he wouldn’t eat these but he loves them. They smell a bit like maple syrup to me. We noticed a difference right away. He is playing more and seems perkier.
customer_reviews.author: Neens

customer_reviews.title: eh...
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to slightly help with bowel and urine odor. It does not eliminate smell all together, don't think it will. My kittens had to warm up to this as a "treat" before I could use it as a reward. The first couple times I offered it I had to crush it and put it in with their food (so they would get used to the flavor and they still had their baby teeth). After I was through about half the bag (I have two kittens so this didn't take long) they enjoyed the taste and would come running when they heard the crinkle of the bag. And as I said, it helps reduce odor noticeably but not overwhelmingly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Think it helped
customer_reviews.text: Our new six month old shelter kitten came home with a respiratory infection and our vet put her on antibiotics. I noticed that she was very gassy, had a rumbly tummy and laid some pungent stinkies in her box. I figured she was experiencing some intestinal distress from the stress of a new home and from the antibiotics, so we tried Daily Digest chews along with Smelly Cat chews. Within a week I noticed an improvement in her symptoms. I gave kitty half a piece each day, and while they are chews, they are more hard than soft, so I cut them in half again to be more kitten size. She likes the flavor and ate them up!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Took sour smell from cat's poop away immediately
customer_reviews.text: My poor kitty just got diagnosed with stomach/intestinal cancer, so "sour"smell was/is from that. After one use, and cat readily ate the snack, next bowel movement smelled less sour, next one and all following ones smelled like regular poop. Unfortunately, had to stop giving a couple days ago as took cat to acupuncturist who is using Chinese herbal medicinals and she doesn't want any other products interfering with her palliative care. However, DVM familiar with company and recommends them (and she has 3 degrees, so that says a lot for this product).
customer_reviews.author: Moanakai

customer_reviews.title: Works like it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Has certainly helped reduce the odors of my cat's feces and helped her to become more regular (she used to be an every other day type of cat which my vet did not like). She readily eats her 2 treats per day - they might be her favorite treats. Wish I had known about this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: These not only work they apparently taste good enough to fight over! They are a bit pricey, to me anyway, but often I find them on sale. I loved other Pet Naturals, so finding Smelly Cat was a huge win! My cat's poop smelled awful. Now that is reduced a lot! The only cons to these are that they are hard and cats aren't meant to chew, and they are shaped like fish which is just weird to me. My boy can chew better so he eats them fast while his sister has trouble chewing them, so he tries to steal hers. If you have two cats referee the treat time!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Clean Scat is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Clean Scat works, and my Siamese kitty goes crazy for it. This is definitely some of the best tasting stuff in her opinion. I have to break up the fish shaped pieces into 4 or 5 little morsels for her which makes the product work even better. I give her the 2 chews right before bed and it cuts down the odor coming from the litter box tremendously!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Blue Devil

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these HIGHLY
customer_reviews.text: My kitty boy LOVES these! AND THEY WORK!!! His poops are nearly as stinky as they were before!!! He BEGS for these each day! Even though it says one full treat twice per day, I make them last by giving my baby half in the morning and half at night and it STILL works!!! I recommend these HIGHLY!!! I even got my Mom's cat to eat these and she loves them too! Even though they are $7.99 per package, I say it's totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: What a Relief!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted our little guy as a stray from the Animal Rescue League and we have no idea what he'd been eating, but we were afraid that his fecal/flatulence problems were going to force us out of our home. My gosh, was that smell BAD!!! I honestly didn't think Smelly Cat would help, but desperation guided me to grasp at that straw and so far so good. It really seems to be doing the trick. In fact, it's working so well that we forget to give it to him as recommended and, believe me, a few fews weeks ago, that wouldn't have been possible.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This year my 10 yr old cat Velcro's poop and breath had become rancid. It was embarrassing to have people over. I crushed one pellet and added a little water to his wet food and it's so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky cat breath!
customer_reviews.text: My newly adopted cat, despite a healthy diet, had such bad breath I couldn't bear to have her too close to my nose. I purchased these, and was very skeptical, as I found the smell of the treats unpleasant; however, after a couple weeks of giving her 1 in the morning and 1 in the evening, her breath no longer smells at all. The litter box was never a big problem, but I have noticed it doesn't retain any odor either. I'm convinced, and ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Clairelan

customer_reviews.title: Good product for your cats
customer_reviews.text: I like buying this for my cats and they seem to love them and go crazy when I feed them to them. I am going to buy more very soon & I recommend this to all cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spain

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My cat Jack had terrible breath. A friend gave me a sample pack of these and his atrocious breath went away! I'm ordering more and plan to keep this around. It's run out and finally, Jack's breath smells terrible again. His litterbox is not a problem as he goes outside to do his business, so I cannot say how it works for that.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Creature

customer_reviews.title: Up to your cat
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my three cats recognized them as treats. I had to break a treat in half and give it as a pill down the throat. It is a relatively large, thick, fish-shape treat. Bulky and hard for a cat to swallow even in pieces. I only tried one bag, so I didn't give them long enough to comment on improvement in smelliness. But I won't be reordering as it is difficult to feed them to a cat, if he doesn't eat them on his own.
customer_reviews.author: shopsandcoupons

customer_reviews.title: My cat won’t eat it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our cat who stinks to high heaven after using his litter box a couple times every day thinking this product will help. He just sniffs it and walks away to my dismay.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hellwig

customer_reviews.title: this works
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this because the only thing we did different was add this to the cat's daily routine and what a difference!!! Our cat goes to the bathroom / litterbox around 3 am, the smell was so bad it would wake me. I would scoop and put the bag outside until morning. Since he gets a few Smelly Cat treats a day - I do not smell his business at all. PS Cat people please scoop daily - you wouldn't flush your toilet once a week, would you? Keep it clean for all using the space. BR
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: Apparently delicious, with no changes.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these, but I didn’t note any changes in his stools or their stink.
customer_reviews.author: FrogJuices

customer_reviews.title: meh!Not helpful for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I am dissapointed with the product. My cat,Miss Kissy loved them. But the product did not help her. After 3 months of using the product her 'sink bombs' stayed stinky. I did not change her food,but I did stop feeding her the cat grass for the last month,as a trial. It appears the cat grass is more helpful with the smell issue.The cat grass,it appears to be helpful than than the Clean Scat product. I really would like a refund of my last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Kidd

customer_reviews.title: The only cat who ate this was the one who ...
customer_reviews.text: The only cat who ate this was the one who doesn't have the problem. When i took the effort to try and hide this in treat pill covers rolled in smashed up treats dipped in treat broth, he would eat it and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaGulia

customer_reviews.title: Will eliminate smelly poop.
customer_reviews.text: When we got our new cat, she was super stressed and it was making her stool smell AWFUL. It would stink up our entire two story house. I gave her these and they worked so well! My family was relieved to say the least. A few weeks in, and she didn't need them anymore. I assume she became more relaxed, and her eating habits became regular. She hasn't needed them since.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Prieto

customer_reviews.title: Just another treat - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It claims to reduce odors, that a cat produces. I was religions about the recommended amounts and followed them until the bag was empty. Unfortunately it little to nothing to freshen or reduce any odor my cat gave off. I do not recommend buying this, the only reason i gave it two stars is because my cat really liked them as treats, other wise they are useless on everything thing the product claims.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foss

customer_reviews.title: My cat gives a digit up
customer_reviews.text: The most striking thing is the smell. It reminds me of soy sauce.. salty.. a little sharp, but not bad smelling My cat loves these things but makes me break it in half for her dainty self. My brother's 2 cats liked it as well but one of them threw up not long after. It stained the carpet too so it doesn't agree with all feline tummies It's a little pricey in my opinion but seems like quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jadoreamazon

customer_reviews.title: They work and the cats love them
customer_reviews.text: These really work and both my cats love them. I have one cat who had horrible breath but these have totally solved that problem. I do have one cat with a tiny mouth and teeth who seems to have a problem eating the treat unless I break it up but they are soft enough to break easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: old enough to know

customer_reviews.title: Gotta eat it for it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Welp, I loved the idea, but my cat has been sniffing & trying to bury this treat for the past hour....I don't think they'll work that way! I'll update if she ever eats it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works as described; Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat and can't really hide our liter box due to the layout of our house. There was a noticeable decline in liter box odors after our cat had these treats daily for about two weeks. Originally I gave the cat 2-3 treats every day. After about two weeks, I tapered off to the same number of treats but only once a week. Still same favorable results. They're definitely worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered. The cats love the tabs like treats.
customer_reviews.author: John Missy D

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS.. but only if your cat will eat it.. I had to chop it up and put it in some wet food.. but it does work.. noticed a BIG difference 2 days later..
customer_reviews.author: Vernon A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, my cat has been taking twice a day for about 1 month now and no difference us made.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Your cat might not eat them
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats with nasty smelling poop. Only 1 cat would eat these treats. The other 2 act like I'm trying to poison them. The one cat who would eat these treats, loves them. It only took about a week before her poops began to smell a lot less. The odor is cut about in half. I'm not sure if it's worth continuing to buy these. if 2 of my cats hate them.
customer_reviews.author: Mariecabbit

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This REALLY Works!!!! Stop the stinky litter box! And my cats love these treats! Thank you Pet Naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Critter

customer_reviews.title: ... work REALLY WELL but two of my cats don't like eating them- they're a very hard dense treat
customer_reviews.text: These work REALLY WELL but two of my cats don't like eating them- they're a very hard dense treat. I have to smash them up into a powder and roll them in Pill Pocket treats to get them to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: My cats had GI issues/ Diarrhea with this product
customer_reviews.text: The cats did not like the taste, had adverse reaction to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes, but my fussy cat wouldn't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: MarNan

customer_reviews.title: no more melly cat... yaaayyy
customer_reviews.text: it took 2 days and i have no more smelly cat! i have 3 cats and just one stinky one, i don't know why, they all eat the same food. i guess it's like people.. some just smell worse than others.. haha. anyway, i'm very impressed. i works and it works fast!! thanks! i won't be gagging when i clean out the litter box anymore.
customer_reviews.author: patricia mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater
customer_reviews.text: Put my cat on the blue Buffalo brand and his poop smelled so badd until these pills... and he actually wants to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: TRESA

customer_reviews.title: really works!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to say that this not only works but he actually likes it! Being in a small space makes this a new MUST HAVE item.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ro

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these! So much that I taught her to "beg" like a dog for them. I think it's helping with stool smell, but I decided to change these out (after they're gone) for the vitamins these guys make.
customer_reviews.author: Queenfisher

customer_reviews.title: One cat likes them the other doesn't
customer_reviews.text: My new rescue kitty doesn't really like them and he's the one that has smelly poop and bad breath! I have to cut them up into pieces and prod him to eat them. He really doesn't understand the concept of treats. Food is food. My other cat loves treats and likes these as well. I will probably give away whats left in the package. My kitty no longer puts out stink bombs now he's on a better quality food. His breath is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: sewsewsilly

customer_reviews.title: Meh -
customer_reviews.text: It made my cat throw up. He has a sensitive stomach. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ishopheretoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Cats like them as treats
customer_reviews.text: You really do not notice so much how well these really work until you run out. Cat owners however should also be aware that if their cats feces is really bad, they need to have them checked by a Vet as it could be a sign of parasites that needs treatment so don't use these in place of a checkup.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyT

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: None of my four kitties would even lick these! They smelled horrible too much spirulina I think.. Might work for some but not for mine. Too costly for them not to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Locey

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but not effective
customer_reviews.text: My cats liked the taste but they didn’t help with feces smell :(
customer_reviews.author: Keya

customer_reviews.title: There is help for smelly litter boxes and body odors!
customer_reviews.text: Since he was a kitten, one of my cats always had a bit of a body odor, and when he went to the bathroom most of the time the smell was terrible! Then I started given him a Smelly Cat in the morning and one in the evening. His body odor went away completely and the litter is not toxic any more. Check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Grey Wolf

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but I think they actually work!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for a few days now and I think there is already a difference. One of my cats is very stinky. Plus, both of my cats seem to really enjoy the taste of these treats. I just wish they weren't so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: kmthoennes

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it to my cat daily for like 3 weeks and barely notice an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Finding a Solution

customer_reviews.title: Ain't science grand?
customer_reviews.text: Do your cat's movements make your eyes water? Do your cat's evacuation practices cause paint to peel? Do your cat's litter-box escapades garner the attention of hazmat teams? Buy these special treats right now. These little nuggets are so effective in eliminating odors that you won't have to distribute them daily. I have no idea how they work, but I can attest (as can our local hazmat team) that they are 100% effective for our cat.
customer_reviews.author: Demetri Callas

customer_reviews.title: No more bad breath!
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazingly well at cutting our cats bad breath! I haven't noticed any improvement in the littler box yet but this is only our third day. Both my cats love these too!
customer_reviews.author: MrsOffbeat

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 of my cats wouldn't eat these
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work out. I have 3 cats, only 1 would eat them, but treats seemed to make him lethargic. The cat I bought it for wouldn't try it. She likes Greenies snacks, but not this one. Seems to have a strong smell like liver. Unfortunately the bag went to waste for me.
customer_reviews.author: smc5013

customer_reviews.title: No change in odors
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice a difference and used it as directed.
customer_reviews.author: espy

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure these work for some but unfortunately both of ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these work for some but unfortunately both of my cats wouldn't eat them. one normally eats everything and the other is very picky. that being said, my house still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cat owner found freedom from smelly cats
customer_reviews.text: I have two large American Domestic cats (25 lbs and 12 lbs). The smell was horrible when either used the cat box and there was no help from any type of litter we tried. Nothing helped until I started to give them Clean Scat. There is no smell. Thank you very much. I always make sure I have this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are reasonably priced and a good size for cat treats
customer_reviews.text: From what I could tell these made no difference. They are reasonably priced and a good size for cat treats, but I wouldn't rely on them for odor control. I think you're better off using an effective cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Shenanigans

customer_reviews.title: Not all my cats will eat them but thankfully the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not all my cats will eat them but thankfully the one who needs it most will and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: No more Smelly Cat at my house!
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Kitty, My 8 month old cat can not only clear the basement after using the litter box, but his breath and fur coat also smelled as bad as the litterbox. Mr. kitty would transfer the smell of his breath to his coat upon cleaning himself. it was not pleasant hugging him. I saw this on Amazon an thought NO WAY!!!.....Well let me tell you since I have been using this there is no more SMELLY MR. KITTY at my house. Just 2 treats per day works like a charm. I will never be without these. Mr. Kitty also loves the taste and looks foward to his daily treat.
customer_reviews.author: LShade67

customer_reviews.title: Hard Chews
customer_reviews.text: I ordered other Pet Naturals for Cats products and ALL bags contained hard chews. That's why I'm giving all of them 3 stars. Per package dates, product still should be good (soft). Smelly Cat does work, when he eats it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana S

customer_reviews.title: PEW PEW PEEEEEEEEEEEEEW
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know yet. Day 1. PEW! THEY STINK JUST AS BAD AS THE POO!~ Will give them a shot and edit comment at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrrr

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat tends to drive people out of the house with her stench when she goes to the bathroom so I figured I should try something. These actually have cut her smell back some and its only been a few days. Seems to be working better each time.
customer_reviews.author: Shlutz McGee

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get to find out if they work or ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to find out if they work or not because my cat (not a picky eater) refused to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: JennnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It Really Helps!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES these treats, and we love the fact that she no longer clears the room when she uses the kitty box. We give her the treats in between meals as per the feeding instructions, and within a few days we have noticable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: flint5292

customer_reviews.title: HELPS REDUCE ODOR!
customer_reviews.text: I give this four stars because it does not completely reduce the atrocious kitty bomb. I suspect there is no product that can eliminate all the odor. Clean Scat comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Freudosa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to make any noticeable difference with our older cat.
customer_reviews.author: Owner

customer_reviews.title: My cat wasn't interested in them, but she's a picky sort
customer_reviews.text: The cat that I bought these for isn't interested in them. She never ate even one, so I can't speak to the claim that these make their poop less offensive. More power to you if you can get your cat to like them.
customer_reviews.author: PA Pete

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell if this helps the poo smell, l but she sure does like these. Her breath is definitely improved and again, she likes them and looks forward to her daily snack. I like this brand in general.
customer_reviews.author: Kat A.

customer_reviews.title: Not enticing
customer_reviews.text: My cat took one whiff, turned her nose up and walked away. She did like the hairball formula though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our cats
customer_reviews.text: Gave both of our cats the kitty butt puddles. Had to throw it out, since it upset their tummies.
customer_reviews.author: Time2Buy

customer_reviews.title: They do make a difference
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn't think that these were going to make such a big difference but they do especially if you have smelly cats! We give them to our cats as a treat and they eat it and actually wait for it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: RYZ

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to work
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats everything, including whatever she catches when hunting in pasture. After using this for about a month, there has been a definite decrease in the smell coming from litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Cat didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice much of a difference with my cat, but she also didn't really like these. She loves the L-Lysine that this company sells and I thing that stuff works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works! Stopped using it for a month. Pew!!! These worked amazingly well for my boy!
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: Not their best tasting
customer_reviews.text: Our cats generally like Pet Naturals treats, but these are, unfortunately, an exception.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Might be tasty and all...
customer_reviews.text: But these treats are just that; tasty. My cat's poop still smells bad, although I clean her box twice daily. She is almost 16 years old and I understand due to her age, her poop might smell worse than other cat's poop. But honestly, I will not buy this product anymore if it doesn't do the job for me and my cat. This is not the only Pet Naturals product that does not work for us, the hairball remedy treatsare just as bad. Tasty but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Has made a BIG difference for our cat with the smelliest poop, whose litter box deposits necessitated immediate scooping if you wanted to continue being able to use the room! His poop just smells like normal cat poop now - not odorless, but manageable After giving two treats a day for a couple of weeks, we've decreased the dosage and do a treat every day or so, and we're maintaining the better smell.
customer_reviews.author: gradgirl003

customer_reviews.title: More or less smelly?
customer_reviews.text: It has yet to be determined whether this actually helps pets from being less smelly, but at the very least, the cats are willing to eat it. I usually have to break it in half for the kitten since he has trouble eating it with his new teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn

customer_reviews.title: cats wont eat it.
customer_reviews.text: my cats wont eat it. the one time one cat did because he was hungry, he ended up vomiting. and they dry out and get hard very quickly after you open the pack.
customer_reviews.author: quest

customer_reviews.title: Picky kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn't eat them. So don't really know if it works. :(
customer_reviews.author: kwalls

customer_reviews.title: My cat didn't care for them
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn't care for the gummy like treats. I wish this came in a powder to put on his food instead.. I'm sure it s a good product, but Mr. Stinky just didn't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: chalkmtn

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these treats and they have cut down on odors at both ends. I find that one a day, or every other day, is sufficient, but my cats were only moderately stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne NIxon

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Ran For The Hills
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn't want anything to do with these. Took one wiff and ran for the hills. That doesn't mean they're not effective...just means I can't find out because my fussy cat won't try them.
customer_reviews.author: P. SmithTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my cat that has extremely bad breath but he won't eat them unless he is completely out of food. I wish they would have made a better tasting treat that does the same idea
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S

customer_reviews.title: Did not work..
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves any treat and initially ate a few of these for a couple days, but eventually he began sniffing at and walking away. The few he did eat did not change his poo for the better either.
customer_reviews.author: dynamica

customer_reviews.title: Too strong scent and hardfor me, and my cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Too strong scent and hardfor me, and my cat didn't eat them... no matter howmnany times you try he eat it, he won't...
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Torres

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used entire package noticed no change in smell. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I would hate to imagine what my cats poop would smell like if I didn't use these!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not for young cats?
customer_reviews.text: For best results it says feed them between meals. Two cats, one about 8 months and another over 1 year old and neither of them liked these. A quick sniff and nothing. Is it because they are young? Even at this young age they are very smelly. The ONLY way I have been able to get one of them to finally eat this chew was mix it in with their meal. They mostly ignore it, even picking it out of the rest of the food. But eventually and still hungry, one went back and ate them. Not sure if this will continue to work. But, quite disappointed. Will have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: My cat was still stinky after 2 weeks of use this is a waste of money don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They smell like licorice. None of my cats will touch them, so no idea if they work.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I think these made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: believe me, he can be a smelly cat, but I don't feel like these ingredients could be great for a cat's system & he puked them up a few times, so I tossed them.
customer_reviews.author: pantone382

product_meta.title: Pet Naturals of Vermont - Clean Scat, Digestive Support and Litter Box Odor Control for Cats, 45 Bite-Sized Chews
product_meta.description:
CLEAN SCAT for your SMELLY CAT!

We changed the name, but all of the amazing benefits are still in full effect! Put a fresh spin on kitty breath & fecal odor! CLEAN SCAT combines specific factors that help to improve fecal quality, clean the blood, reduce the frequency of flatulence, and freshen breath. What makes CLEAN SCAT unique is the inclusion of the Champex brand Champignon Mushroom which has been extensively studied for its ability to suppress odor-causing chemicals in the intestines. Key Benefits
• Spirulina - is a very good source of Chlorophyll which has a deodorizing effect and helps clean the body of toxins
• Parsley - also an excellent source of Chlorophyll
• Champignon Mushroom Extract (ChampexTM brand) has been studied extensively for its ability to reduce odors and improve intestinal conditions. It has been shown to stop foul breath at the source in the intestines. ChampexTM attacks foul breath and body odors where they originate, supporting and maintain- ing a clean condition within the intestines by sup- pressing the generation of toxic chemicals
• Yucca Schidigera Extract has been shown to reduce the intensity of fecal order in cats by either altering the production or availability of hydrogen sulfide in the large intestine
• Very palatable sugar-free chicken liver flavored chew!
• Re-sealable bag for extra freshness
• Made in the USA!
feature_bullets: Clean Scat includes Spirulina - is a very good source of Chlorophyll which has a deodorizing effect and helps clean the body of toxins
Champignon Mushroom Extract has been studied extensively for its ability to reduce odors and improve intestinal conditions
Yucca Schidigera Extract has been shown to reduce the intensity of fecal order in cats by altering the production or availability of hydrogen sulfide in the large intestine.
Pet Naturals of Vermont supplements are free of wheat, corn and artificial ingredients
Pet Natural’s of Vermont products are Veterinarian formulated, NASC approved and manufactured in the USA.
